trans-unit.target: El elemento est diseado como el campo de texto para un menulista.(No implementado para la plataforma Windows)

trans-unit.source: The element is styled like a progress bar.
trans-unit.target: El elemento tiene el estilo de una barra de progreso.

trans-unit.source: The element is styled like a progress bar. Use progress-bar instead
The element is translucent (that is, content behind the element can be seen).
trans-unit.target: El elemento es translcido (es decir,se puede ver el contenido detrs del elemento).

trans-unit.source: The element lays out its contents using flow layout (block-and-inline layout).
trans-unit.target: El elemento expone su contenido utilizando la disposicin de flujo (disposicin en bloque y en lnea).

trans-unit.target: El elemento se ve as cuando se inserta en la pgina:

trans-unit.source: The element must float on the end side of its containing block. That is the right side with ltr scripts, and the left side with rtl scripts.
The element must float on the end side of its containing block. That is the right side with ltr scripts, and the left side with rtl scripts.
trans-unit.target: El elemento debe flotar en el lado final de su bloque de contencin.Ese es el lado derecho con los guiones ltr,y el lado izquierdo con los guiones rtl.

trans-unit.source: The element must float on the left side of its containing block.
trans-unit.target: El elemento debe flotar en el lado izquierdo de su bloque de contencin.

trans-unit.source: The element must float on the right side of its containing block.
trans-unit.target: El elemento debe flotar en el lado derecho de su bloque de contencin.

trans-unit.source: The element must float on the start side of its containing block. That is the left side with ltr scripts, and the right side with rtl scripts.
The element must float on the start side of its containing block. That is the left side with ltr scripts, and the right side with rtl scripts.
trans-unit.target: El elemento debe flotar en el lado inicial de su bloque de contencin.Ese es el lado izquierdo con los guiones ltr,y el lado derecho con los guiones rtl.

trans-unit.source: The element must not float.
trans-unit.target: El elemento no debe flotar.

trans-unit.source: The element offers no user-controllable method for resizing it.
trans-unit.target: El elemento no ofrece un mtodo controlable por el usuario para redimensionarlo.

trans-unit.source: The element skips its contents. The skipped contents must not be accessible to user-agent features, such as find-in-page, tab-order navigation, etc., nor be selectable or focusable. This is similar to giving the contents display: none.

The element spans across all columns. Content in the normal flow that appears before the element is automatically balanced across all columns before the element appears. The element establishes a new block formatting context.
trans-unit.target: El elemento se extiende a travs de todas las columnas.El contenido en el flujo normal que aparece antes del elemento se equilibra automticamente a travs de todas las columnas antes de que el elemento aparezca.El elemento establece un nuevo contexto de formato de bloque.

trans-unit.source: The element turns on layout containment, style containment, and paint containment. If the element is not relevant to the user, it also skips its contents. Unlike hidden, the skipped contents must still be available as normal to user-agent features such as find-in-page, tab order navigation, etc., and must be focusable and selectable as normal.
The element won't be selected as a potential anchor.

The element's content has been specifically and carefully crafted to use colors, images, and styles in a thoughtful and/or important way, such that being altered by the browser might actually make things worse rather than better. The appearance of the content should not be changed except by the user's request. For example, a page might include a list of information with rows whose background colors alternate between white and a light grey. Removing the background color would decrease the legibility of the content.
trans-unit.target: El contenido del elemento ha sido especfica y cuidadosamente elaborado para usar colores,imgenes y estilos de una manera considerada y/o importante,de tal manera que ser alterado por el navegador podra en realidad empeorar las cosas en lugar de mejorarlas.La apariencia del contenido no debe ser cambiada excepto a peticin del usuario.Por ejemplo,una pgina podra incluir una lista de informacin con filas cuyos colores de fondo alternan entre el blanco y el gris claro.La eliminacin del color de fondo disminuira la legibilidad del contenido.

trans-unit.source: The element's height is set to the value of min-height whenever min-height is larger than max-height or height.
trans-unit.target: La altura del elemento se establece en el valor de min-height cuando min-height es mayor que max-height o height .

trans-unit.source: The element's width is set to the value of min-width whenever min-width is larger than max-width or width.
trans-unit.target: El ancho del elemento se establece en el valor de min-width siempre que min-width sea mayor que max-width o width .

trans-unit.source: The elements below have an initial color theme. They can be further themed according to the user's color scheme preference.

The elliptical gradient will be centered 20% from the top left, and will repeat 10 times between the center and the farthest corner (the bottom right corner). Browsers supporting multi position color stops will display a red and green striped ellipse. Browsers not supporting the syntax yet will see a gradient that goes from red to black and then from blue to green.
The em is a very useful unit in CSS, since it automatically adapts its length relative to the font that the reader chooses to use.

The example adds the scroll-snap-points-y and scroll-snap-destination properties, which are deprecated, to make scroll snapping work in Firefox. We also added the scroll-snap-type property twice, once with the y axis value needed for browsers that support the new spec, and once for Firefox pre-68, which supports the property but without the y value.

trans-unit.source: The example below shows an image that has been floated left, and the shape-outside property applied with a value of circle(50%). This creates a circle shape, and the content wrapping the float now wraps around that shape. This changes the length of the wrapping text's line boxes.

trans-unit.source: The expression can be values combining the addition ( + ), subtraction ( - ), multiplication ( * ) and division ( / ) operators, using standard operator precedence rules. You may also use parentheses to establish computation order when needed.

trans-unit.source: The expressions can be math expressions (using arithmetic operators), literal values, or other expressions, such as attr(), that evaluate to a valid argument type (like <length>), or nested min() and max() functions.
The expressions can be math expressions (using arithmetic operators), literal values, or other expressions, such as attr(), that evaluate to a valid argument type (like <length>).

The expressions can be math functions (see calc() for more information), literal values, or other expressions, such as attr(), that evaluate to a valid argument type (like <length>), or nested min() and max() functions. As math expressions, so you can use addition, subtraction, multiplication and division without using the calc() function itself. You may also use parentheses to establish computation order when needed.
trans-unit.target: Las expresiones pueden ser funciones matemáticas (consulte calc() para obtener más información), valores literales u otras expresiones, como attr() , que evalúan un tipo de argumento válido (como <length> ), o min() y max() anidados () funciones. Como expresiones matemáticas, puede usar la suma, la resta, la multiplicación y la división sin usar la función calc() . También puede usar paréntesis para establecer el orden de cálculo cuando sea necesario.

trans-unit.source: The face background color for 3-D elements that appear 3-D due to two concentric layers of surrounding border. Should be used with the ButtonText foreground color.
trans-unit.target: El color de fondo de la cara para elementos tridimensionales que aparecen tridimensionales debido a dos capas concéntricas del borde circundante. Debe usarse con el color de primer plano ButtonText .

trans-unit.source: The face selected for a given value of font-stretch depends on the faces supported by the font in question. If the font does not provide a face that exactly matches the given value, then values less than 100% map to a narrower face, and values greater than or equal to 100% map to a wider face.
trans-unit.target: La cara seleccionada para un valor dado de font-stretch de fuente depende de las caras admitidas por la fuente en cuestión. Si la fuente no proporciona una cara que coincida exactamente con el valor dado, los valores inferiores al 100% se asignan a una cara más estrecha y los valores mayores o iguales al 100% se asignan a una cara más ancha.

trans-unit.source: The fallback alignment for first baseline is start, the one for last baseline is end.
trans-unit.target: La alineación alternativa para la first baseline es start , la de la last baseline es end .

trans-unit.source: The feature of flexbox that was most exciting to many of us was that it gave us proper alignment control for the first time. It made it easy to center a box on the page. Flex items can stretch to the height of the flex container, meaning that equal height columns were possible. These were things we have wanted to do for a very long time, and have come up with all kinds of hacks to accomplish, at least visually.

Flex items can stretch to the height of the flex container, meaning that equal height columns were possible. trans-unit.source: The filter mechanism is extensible and enables you to develop and add filters later. For more information about filters, see Introduction to Filters and Transitions.
trans-unit.target: El mecanismo de filtro es extensible y le permite desarrollar y agregar filtros más adelante. Para obtener más información sobre los filtros, consulte Introducción a los filtros y las transiciones .

trans-unit.source: The final Basic Shape is the most complex and enables the creation of many side shapes by way of creating a polygon(). This shape accepts three or more pairs of values (a polygon must at least draw a triangle). These values are co-ordinates drawn with reference to the reference box.
trans-unit.target: La forma básica final es la más compleja y permite la creación de muchas formas laterales mediante la creación de un polygon() . Esta forma acepta tres o más pares de valores (un polígono debe al menos dibujar un triángulo). Estos valores son coordenadas dibujadas con referencia al cuadro de referencia.

trans-unit.source: The final color has the hue of the top color, while using the saturation and luminosity of the bottom color.
